  • Method Details

    • isSnakeOutside

      public boolean isSnakeOutside(Snake s)
      Check if the snake is outside the arena bounds
      Parameters:
      s - Represents the snake
      Returns:
      true if the snake is outside, false otherwise

    • mark

      public void mark(Poligono obj, String str, boolean isOccupied)
      Mark the area of the arena occupied by the given polygon
      Parameters:
      obj - Represents the polygon that will be added to the arena
      str - Represents the character of this type of object (Food[F], Snake[H/S], Object[O])
      isOccupied - Represents whether the area will be marked as occupied or not (Helps in food random generation)

    • unmark

      public void unmark(Poligono obj, boolean isOccupied)
      Unmark the area of the arena occupied by the given polygon
      Parameters:
      obj - Represents the polygon that will be removed from the arena
      isOccupied - Represents weather the area will stay occupied after the object is removed or not

    • availableArea

      public Ponto<Integer>[] availableArea(int size)
      Calculates the available areas based on the size of the snake
      Parameters:
      size - Represents the size of the snake (n tiles)*tileSize
      Returns:
      an array with points that represents the available areas on the arena
